description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Electronic Invaders in Cyber Space!  Climb into the cockpit of the experimental Starfighter X for waves of retro-shooter action.
description.short: Electronic Invaders in Cyber Space!  Climb into the cockpit of the experimental Starfighter X for waves of retro-shooter action.
